entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 in the evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
